languages.text: {n}Мужчина неопределенного возраста оборачивается к вам и шумно вздыхает. По дыханию понятно, что он прибыл на церемонию после одного-двух стаканов крепких напитков.{/n}
{n}A man of indeterminate age turns to you and sighs loudly. You can tell by his breath that he came to the ceremony after indulging in one or two glasses of strong drink.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Мужчина неопределенного возраста оборачивается к вам и шумно вздыхает. По дыханию понятно, что он прибыл на церемонию после одного-двух стаканов крепких напитков.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A man of indeterminate age turns to you and sighs loudly. You can tell by his breath that he came to the ceremony after indulging in one or two glasses of strong drink.{/n}

{n}A man of indeterminate age turns to you and sighs loudly. You can tell by his breath that he came to the ceremony after indulging in one or two glasses of strong drink.{/n}

languages.text: {n}一个你看不出来多大年纪的人转过头来，大声叹息着。从他的呼吸中你可以判断出来，他是喝了一两杯烈酒之后才来参加葬礼的。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A man of indeterminate age turns to you and sighs loudly. You can tell by his breath that he came to the ceremony after indulging in one or two glasses of strong drink.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一个你看不出来多大年纪的人转过头来，大声叹息着。从他的呼吸中你可以判断出来，他是喝了一两杯烈酒之后才来参加葬礼的。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un hombre de edad difícil de determinar se gira hacia ti y suspira sonoramente. Por su aliento, ha venido a la ceremonia después de tomar un par de copas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A man of indeterminate age turns to you and sighs loudly. You can tell by his breath that he came to the ceremony after indulging in one or two glasses of strong drink.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un hombre de edad difícil de determinar se gira hacia ti y suspira sonoramente. Por su aliento, ha venido a la ceremonia después de tomar un par de copas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}年齢不詳の男がこちらへ振り返り、大きくため息をつく。吐いた息はかなり酒臭く、式の後に強い酒を1、2杯ほど飲んできたのだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A man of indeterminate age turns to you and sighs loudly. You can tell by his breath that he came to the ceremony after indulging in one or two glasses of strong drink.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}年齢不詳の男がこちらへ振り返り、大きくため息をつく。吐いた息はかなり酒臭く、式の後に強い酒を1、2杯ほど飲んできたのだろう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ein Mann undefinierbaren Alters wendet sich dir zu und seufzt laut. Du merkst an seinem Atem, dass er schon vor der Zeremonie ein oder zwei Gläser mit starkem Alkohol genossen hat.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A man of indeterminate age turns to you and sighs loudly. You can tell by his breath that he came to the ceremony after indulging in one or two glasses of strong drink.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein Mann undefinierbaren Alters wendet sich dir zu und seufzt laut. Du merkst an seinem Atem, dass er schon vor der Zeremonie ein oder zwei Gläser mit starkem Alkohol genossen hat.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un homme d'un âge indéterminé se tourne vers vous et laisse échapper un long soupir. À en juger par son haleine, il semble avoir bu un ou deux verres d'alcool fort avant même de venir à la cérémonie.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A man of indeterminate age turns to you and sighs loudly. You can tell by his breath that he came to the ceremony after indulging in one or two glasses of strong drink.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un homme d'un âge indéterminé se tourne vers vous et laisse échapper un long soupir. À en juger par son haleine, il semble avoir bu un ou deux verres d'alcool fort avant même de venir à la cérémonie.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yaşını tahmin edemediğin bir adam sana dönüp yüksek sesle iç çekiyor. Verdiği nefesten, törene gelmeden önce bir iki kadeh sert içki yuvarladığını anlayabiliyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A man of indeterminate age turns to you and sighs loudly. You can tell by his breath that he came to the ceremony after indulging in one or two glasses of strong drink.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yaşını tahmin edemediğin bir adam sana dönüyor ve sesli bir şekilde iç çekiyor. Verdiği nefesten törene gelmeden önce birkaç bardak sağlam bir içki yuvarladığını anlayabiliyorsun.{/n}
